close_conf_msg.message: Are you sure that you want to close that tab?
close_conf_msg.description: Message of confirming of closing tab

pin.description: Message after hovering plugin icon - pin

unpin.description: Message after hovering plugin icon - unpin

how_to.message:
How to use the plugin:
To pin or unpin tab click on plugin icon (pin) or use shortcut (default "Ctrl+Shift+X"). To close current tab double click on the icon or double use shortcut.

change_shrt_popup.message:
1. Go to chrome://extensions/.
2. Scroll to the bottom of the page and click "Keyboard shortcuts".
3. You can now enter your shortcut in the field next to the name of plugin.

rule_name_popup.message: Here you can enter a name of the rule

regular_expression_popup.message: Here you enter URL you would like to pin. You can either enter it with regular expression or just by typing in the link of the page.

tab_index_popup.message: This parameter specifies where will be the pinned tab placed (eg. "0" means 0 tabs from left and "3" means that there will be at least 3 pinned tabs before the pinned tab).

enabled_popup.message: It specifies whether the rule is enabled or not.

close.message: Close tab after double clicking on plugin icon.

close_conf.message: Confirm closing tab after double clicking on plugin icon.
close_conf.description: `Confirm closing tab after dbl click` checkbox

back_index.message: After unpinning tab move it to right.
back_index.description: `After unpinning tab move it to right` checkbox

options_saved.description: Message confirming that options were saved

clear_confirm.message: Are you sure that you want to delete all your options?

refresh_confirm.message: Are you sure that you want to leave without saving your options?
refresh_confirm.description: Message confirming leaving options page unsaved

translators_msg_1.description: Who translated extention - for single translator
